name: SpellingSquad
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: spelling squad
des:
Spelling Squad is the only skill you need to prepare your first to eight graders for their school or National Spelling Bee contest.
Each level contains 50 at-grade level words and 50 more advanced words totaling 450 words to challenge your Spelling Bee contestant.
To get started, you will first need to select a grade level. For example, say, First Grade, for first grade level test.
When spelling, spell at normal speed. Try not to slow down too much to avoid time out.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
